location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from N Smith, 1st Officer, ship Kusroevie, to the Residency

mods.abstract: The letter relates to an incident on board the Kusroevie. Smith reports of the 'insolent' behaviour of the pilot who came on board his ship at Bushire, resulting in an altercation between the man and his commanding officer, Captain Waddington. Smith requests that action be taken against the pilot.
